com.mesosphere.sdk.framework

Class FrameworkRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.framework.FrameworkRunner

  • public class FrameworkRunner
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which sets up and executes the correct AbstractScheduler instance.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static Plan EMPTY_DEPLOY_PLAN
      Empty complete deploy plan to be used if the scheduler is uninstalling and was launched in a finished state.

        public void registerAndRunFramework(Persister persister,
